name: astrosas
title: Astrosas
desc: Built with TailwindCSS and React/RadixUI. Dark design with brand theme colors. Smooth and fast transitions across clutter-free pages, perfect for creating a stylish and modern web presence.
article:
Built with Astro, TailwindCSS, and React/RadixUI

Main Features:

  • Perfect Lighthouse Scores: 100/100/100/100 for both mobile and desktop!
  • Fully Responsive and Easily Customizable: Seamlessly adapts to all devices with just two color sets â one neutral and one for your brand.
  • Clean Dark Design: A consistent, easy-to-use dark theme with simple, well-structured components.
  • Efficient Navigation: Includes a mega-style desktop menu, dropdowns for mobile, and an accordion component, all animated with RadixUI.
  • Powerful Search Component: Fuzzy search with highlight, fallback options, arrow key navigation, Enter to select, and Escape to reset.
  • Comprehensive Blog Setup: Astro Content Collections with pagination, search, previous/next post navigation, tags, table of contents, social sharing, and draft support.
  • Customizable Contact Form: Fully functional and easy to configure.
  • SEO Optimized: Includes SEO tags, RSS feed, and sitemap generation for better search engine visibility.
  • Icon and Font Flexibility: Local fonts using Fontsource, with Carbon and Material Design icon sets.
  • Flexible Footer Options: Choose between slim and classic designs.
  • Detailed Pricing Page: Features a comparison layout for clear pricing information.
  • 404 Page: Includes the search component for better user experience.
  • All Essential Pages: Everything you need is included, ready to be tailored to your needs.
  • Clear Documentation: All necessary information and guidance are included in the documentation, with helpful code comments wherever they are needed for easy understanding and customization.
